install.title: How to install
install.description: This application is actually a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be directly installed to your device. Learn more about how to install this application on your device:

ios.title: Install on iOS
ios.description: To install a PWA on your Home Screen, follow these steps:

steps.home_screen: Tap the icon labeled 'Add to Home Screen'
steps.name: Confirm the name of the PWA then tap 'Add' in the upper-right corner
steps.launch: You can now launch the application from your Home Screen

android.title: Install on Android
android.description: Using Chrome for Android, you will automatically be prompted to install the app on your system. Click 'Install' to install the application on your device.

chrome.title: Install on Chrome (desktop)
chrome.description: When using Chrome for Desktop, you can click on the menu (the 3 dots in the upper-right corner), then 'Install ...' to add the application to Chrome Applications.
